editorialSummary.text: Simple apartment hotel offering casual units with kitchenettes, plus a lounge & free WiFi.

originalText.text: My leasıng agent Jenesa was wonderful. The entıre leasıng staff was great. They made my move ın experıence quick and easy. ı most defınıtly recommend central park ıf your thınkıng of reloctıng to the orlando area.

originalText.text: At first I loved it great place to crash had to stay in new york for a while. I woke up one morning to find a mouse digging through my trash it jumped out and ran under the fridge. I killed it, told them about it and they blamed me of course wasn't surprised. Since no one did anything about i took care of it myself found a hole under the refrigerator no only that under the refrigerator and there was a huge space underneath the sink it was disgusting you can tell it hadn't been clean for a while . During my stay I saw a couple of more mice running around i killed a couple. They should of really closed the holes in that room i feel bad for the person who is in there now.

originalText.text: Stayed few nights with friend, had room with own bathroom and kitchenette area. Great place to stay, plus having subway acsess, grocer, cafe and Central Park all right there in little walking distance. Definitely would stay time and time again.

text.text: Stayed few nights with friend, had room with own bathroom and kitchenette area. Great place to stay, plus having subway acsess, grocer, cafe and Central Park all right there in little walking distance. Definitely would stay time and time again.

originalText.text: I was here for 5 months (from april to august). Now, it's been 3 months after I left and I'm still strugling to get my deposit back (no response to emails). I wouldn't advice anyone to rent in this place,  you'll never get back your initial deposit (which is usually a month rent ~1500$), and it sounds like a fraud ..

originalText.text:
Great place to stay. Convenient location, 1 minute away from central park and subway. Shopping and dining 5 minutes walking.
It's a gr8 find in an expensive city.
